attributes.action: End the MP's entitlement to a FULL FAMILY HOME  as a 2nd Home
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP's do not "need" the 2nd home to be a fully-fledged "family home".... Many other people work long days in the city and either travel home or stay overnight in an hotel, and do not require TOP flight hotel either.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
